text: June Zhu or Zhu Jing (Chinese:朱婧; born April 18, 1988), born Yue Hanzan (月罕瓒), is a folk singer of Dai ethnicity from Yunnan, China. She released her first solo album in 2008 in Taiwan under Universal Music. Years later after competing in a singing competition, she released a new single on July 25, 2014 and her second solo album in September 2014. She participated in Sisters Who Make Waves in 2020. ==Discography== === Studio albums === * 2008: At the End of the Sky * 2014: Dream Horse (Chinese: Yi Meng Wei Ma) === Singles === * 2004: Shangri-La (June Zhu debut single EP) * 2013: 她; She (English translation) (June Zhu single EP) * 2014: Mother Rocker ==References== ==External links== *M.yyq.cn *Weibo.com *Baike.baidu.com *Blog.sina.com.cn Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese female singers Category:Singers from Yunnan Category:21st-century Chinese singers Category:21st-century women singers Category:Dai people
title: Zhu Jing
